testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Verify navigation menu exists with Explore, Featured, Login/Signup links
Check for image gallery grid layout on homepage
Verify application shows real image showcases, not placeholder content
Test navigation between different pages (Explore, Featured)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional image gallery with navigation and real content
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or no interactive elements, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: User Authentication Flow Test
testCases.description: Test complete user registration and login functionality
steps: Test user registration with valid email, username, and password
Verify successful registration redirects to authenticated state
Verify authentication state persists across page refreshes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can successfully register, login, logout, and maintain session state

testCases.name: Image Gallery Display Test
testCases.description: Test image gallery functionality and display
steps: Verify image grid displays with proper layout
Test clicking on individual images to view details
Verify image metadata (title, description) displays properly
testCases.expectedOutcome: Image gallery displays properly with functional image viewing and search

testCases.name: Image Upload Functionality Test
steps: Select an image file (PNG or JPEG)
Fill in title and description fields
Check that uploaded image appears in gallery
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authenticated users can successfully upload images with metadata

testCases.name: Navigation and Routing Test
testCases.description: Test application navigation and routing functionality
steps: Test navigation to all main pages: /, /explore, /featured, /auth
Verify protected routes redirect unauthenticated users to login
Verify user dropdown menu functionality when logged in
Test responsive navigation on different screen sizes
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation links work correctly with proper authentication handling

testCases.name: User Profile Management Test
testCases.description: Test user profile viewing and management
steps: Verify user's uploaded images display in dashboard
testCases.expectedOutcome: User profiles display correctly with proper user data and uploaded content

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Verify navigation menu adapts to screen size
Verify forms and buttons are properly sized and accessible
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays properly and remains functional across all screen sizes

testCases.name: Search and Filter Test
testCases.description: Test image search and filtering capabilities
steps: Test search functionality with various keywords
Test filtering by categories if available
Verify search handles empty results gracefully
Test search with special characters and edge cases
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality works correctly and returns relevant results

testCases.name: Error Handling and Edge Cases Test
testCases.description: Test application error handling and edge case scenarios
steps: Test image upload with invalid file types
Test form submission with missing required fields
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with informative user feedback

testCases.name: Application Performance Test
testCases.description: Test application loading performance and responsiveness
steps: Test image loading performance in gallery
Test application with large number of images
Check for memory leaks during extended usage
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and performs smoothly under normal usage

testCases.name: Social Features Test
testCases.description: Test social interaction features like likes, comments, and follows
steps: Verify notifications display for social interactions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Social features work correctly with proper notification handling
